Scripts.OnEnter:
local tooltipText = self:GetAttribute("tooltipText")
if tooltipText then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(_G[tooltipText]) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
if not self:GetParent().StipButton then self:GetParent().StipButton = {} end
local stripIndex = #self:GetParent().StipButton + 1 self:GetParent().StipButton[stripIndex] = self
if ( mod(stripIndex, 2) == 0 ) then self.Background:SetTexture(1, 1, 1) else self.Background:SetTexture(0, 0, 0) end

Scripts.OnClick:
if not BattlegroundsData[self.bgID].statistics.isCollapsed then self.ToggleMinus:Hide() BattlegroundsData[self.bgID].statistics.isCollapsed = true else self.TogglePlus:Hide() BattlegroundsData[self.bgID].statistics.isCollapsed = false end
InspectBattlegroundStatisticsUpdate()

Scripts.OnLoad:
if not self:GetParent().StipButton then self:GetParent().StipButton = {} end
local stripIndex = #self:GetParent().StipButton + 1 self:GetParent().StipButton[stripIndex] = self
if ( mod(stripIndex, 2) == 0 ) then self.Background:SetTexture(0.8, 0.8, 0.8) else self.Background:SetTexture(0.3, 0.3, 0.3) end

Scripts.OnShow:
local factionID = C_Unit:GetFactionID("player")
if factionID then self.Container.Faction:SetTexCoord(unpack(self.factionEmblem[factionID])) end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.LoadingSpinner.showRetrievingText = true self.LoadingSpinner.Text:SetText(STORE_WAIT_SERVER_RESPONSE) self.LoadingSpinner.Text:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) self.LoadingSpinner.Dots:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b)
